references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models which underly the approach in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat GANs on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the state-of-the-art performance of diffusion models in image generation, inspiring the application to video generation.
This is a seminal paper directly applying diffusion models to video generation, providing a crucial baseline for the current work.

references.paper_title: Make-A-Video: Text-to-video generation without text-video data
references.reason: This paper tackles text-to-video generation using a novel approach without text-video training data, a related problem that influences the current approach.

references.paper_title: Latent video diffusion models for high-fidelity long video generation
references.reason: This paper explores high-fidelity long video generation, directly addressing a limitation that the current paper aims to improve.
